programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: King of Devil's Island
programme.desc: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys’ home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Otar's Death
programme.desc: Keti and her son Nika find themselves in huge trouble when he hits an old man with his car. With the victim’s family threatening to press charges, Keti must find a way to raise a huge sum of money or Nika might go to prison.

programme.title: Inhuman
programme.desc: A sister coming home with a bag of money doesn't know her younger sister being murdered just a few minutes before and hidden under her bed. Someone in the dark is sneakily watching her home alone the whole night.

programme.title: A Summer In Mykonos
programme.desc: A mother-daughter vacation turns into a surprise for Jana when her mother Susanne unexpectedly sets up a meeting between her and her father, Jens. As Susanne tries to secretly rope Jens into funding Jana’s studies, Jana seeks solace with the kindly Nikos.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: The Lost Son
programme.desc: A street kid discovers the body of a convicted murderer who was only recently released from prison. Inspector Mehmet's investigation leads him to a foundation that helps homeless kids. But something is fishy about this charity.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

programme.title: Torch
programme.desc: In a war zone, two sisters, stuck in a basement while waiting for their father, attempt to distract themselves from the desperation of their situation by playing games and recounting old stories.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Dutch tycoon Jan dies suddenly in Indonesia, leaving his wife Agathe in shock. Their son and his pregnant wife come from the Netherlands to inherit the family empire and are dismayed to find out that Jan's mistress Siti has a crucial role in his will.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Hoarders S12 - EP 16
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives.

programme.title: Domino Masters - EP 6
programme.desc: Teams of domino enthusiasts go head-to-head in a competition to create mind-blowing masterpieces and take home the title and cash prize.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Food - EP 4
programme.desc: Modern Marvels goes straight for the taste buds in an all-compassing celebration and exploration of food. Celebrated food expert Adam Richman crisscrosses the country taking a deep dive into how food products are made, detailing both the process of the craft and the inspiration behind the ideas.

programme.title: The Great Canadian Baking Show Series 5 - EP 3
programme.desc: The best amateur bakers from across Canada compete in a series of themed culinary challenges that celebrate their diversity. Ten of the country's most passionate bakers go head-to-head in a series of tasks that celebrate their diverse backgrounds, families and communities. In each episode they'll face three nail-biting rounds, in a warm-spirited competition that celebrates personal achievement and the joy of baking.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: Torch
programme.desc: In a war zone, two sisters, stuck in a basement while waiting for their father, attempt to distract themselves from the desperation of their situation by playing games and recounting old stories.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: East Frisian: Atonement
programme.desc: Detective Ann Kathrin Klaasen grapples with her father's unsolved murder, which still haunts her after fifteen years. After much urging from her concerned partner Frank Wellerto to seek help, she heads to a doctor, where she notices a clue in the office.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Dutch tycoon Jan dies suddenly in Indonesia, leaving his wife Agathe in shock. Their son and his pregnant wife come from the Netherlands to inherit the family empire and are dismayed to find out that Jan's mistress Siti has a crucial role in his will.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Abu Omar
programme.desc: Under a strict military curfew Salah, a grieving father, sets out on the road to cross the Israeli border carrying his dead son Omar in a duffel bag. Miri, a pregnant single woman, decides to help him out at all costs while fending off the terrible heat.
